props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: orientation
props.description: The orientation of the navigation menu.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description:
The uncontrolled value of the item that should be initially selected.

To render a controlled navigation menu, use the `value` prop instead.

props.name: value
props.description:
The controlled value of the navigation menu item that should be currently open.
When non-nullish, the menu will be open. When nullish, the menu will be closed.

To render an uncontrolled navigation menu, use the `defaultValue` prop instead.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: onOpenChangeComplete
props.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the navigation menu is closed.

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback fired when the value changes.

props.name: delay
props.description: How long to wait before opening the navigation menu. Specified in milliseconds.

props.name: closeDelay
props.description: How long to wait before closing the navigation menu. Specified in milliseconds.
